problem_text: Suppose that groups G, H act faithfully on a regular rooted tree by finite-state automorphisms. Can their free product G ∗ H act faithfully on a regular rooted tree by finite state automorphisms? V. I. Sushchanski˘ı
answer: Yes, it can (M. Fedorova, A. Oliynyk, Algebra Discrete Math., 23, no. 2 (2017), 230–236).
